SEARCH
Package squire.circuit

Class QuantumGate

java.lang.Object
squire.circuit.QuantumGate
All Implemented Interfaces:
CircuitModifier, CombinableCircuitModifier
Direct Known Subclasses:
CNOTGate, CZGate, HGate, IGate, RXGate, RYGate, RZGate, SGate, SwapGate, TGate, XGate, YGate, ZGate
public abstract class QuantumGate extends Object implements CombinableCircuitModifier
The QuantumGate class is an abstract implementation of the CombinableCircuitModifier interface, representing a quantum gate that can be applied to a quantum state vector. It defines operations for constructing quantum gates based on a complex matrix, number of qubits, and target qubits. The gate can be applied to a StateVector and provides methods to retrieve its complex matrix representation.
See Also:

  • StateVector

  • Constructor Details

    • QuantumGate

      public QuantumGate(ComplexMatrix matrix, int numQubits, int... targetBits)
      Constructs a quantum gate with the specified complex matrix, number of qubits, and target qubits. The quantum gate is designed to operate on a quantum state vector, applying a transformation defined by the given complex matrix to the specified target qubits within a quantum register of the provided size.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The complex matrix defining the quantum gate.
      numQubits - The total number of qubits in the quantum system.
      targetBits - The indices of the qubits to which the gate is applied.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the matrix is not square or the number of target qubits is invalid.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public StateVector apply(StateVector state)
      Applies the quantum gate to a given quantum state vector.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface CircuitModifier
      Parameters:
      state - The quantum state vector to which the gate is applied.
      Returns:
      The resulting quantum state vector after applying the gate.

    • asMatrix

      public ComplexMatrix asMatrix()
      Returns the complex matrix representation of the quantum gate.
      Specified by:
      asMatrix in interface CombinableCircuitModifier
      Returns:
      The complex matrix of the quantum gate.

    • combine

      public CircuitModifier combine(CombinableCircuitModifier c)
      Combines the current quantum gate with another combinable circuit modifier. The combination is performed by multiplying the matrices representing both modifiers. This method is part of the CombinableCircuitModifier interface.
      Specified by:
      combine in interface CombinableCircuitModifier
      Parameters:
      c - The combinable circuit modifier to be combined with the current quantum gate.
      Returns:
      A new circuit modifier representing the combination of the two modifiers.
